name: First Run Movie Theater
text: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show! Our digital movie theater shows some of the most popular movies currently running in theaters.
movieinfo:
Ghostbusters

  • 8.26.16 - 9.1.16
  • Friday: 6pm 
  • Saturday: 3pm & 6pm
  • Sunday: 3pm
  • Monday-Thursday: 3pm

Synopsis: After the members of a team of scientists (Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray) lose their cushy positions at a university in New York City, they decide to become "ghostbusters" to wage a high-tech battle with the supernatural for money. They stumble upon a gateway to another dimension, a doorway that will release evil upon the city. The Ghostbusters must now save New York from complete destruction.

Star Trek Beyond

  • 8.26.16 - 9.1.16
  • Friday: 9pm
  • Saturday: 9pm
  • Sunday: 6pm
  • Monday-Thursday: 6pm

Synopsis: A surprise attack in outer space forces the Enterprise to crash-land on a mysterious world. The assault came from Krall (Idris Elba), a lizard-like dictator who derives his energy by sucking the life out of his victims. Krall needs an ancient and valuable artifact that's aboard the badly damaged starship. Left stranded in a rugged wilderness, Kirk (Chris Pine), Spock (Zachary Quinto) and the rest of the crew must now battle a deadly alien race while trying to find a way off their hostile planet.
